name: Frozen Frenzy (itch)
description:
Entry for the Game Jam "Kindred Community Game Jam#5"

Theme was "The fire mustn't go out" at the "Penguin Party"
you were free to choses either of the two themes.

It's a little party game where you play against Bots (currently) in 3 little minigames.

Game made by Sen(Art) and me (Code) in Godot Engine

Music was premade and comes from opengameart.org.

We had a lot of fun doing this project and kinda think about continuing it and add Multiplay to it to have a fun litte game you can play with friends and try to top each other.
